column1: Having considered the allocutus of the appellant, where he has said that he was
a 16-year-old schoolboy at the time of the commission of this offence, the learned
High  Court  Judge  has  imposed  life  imprisonment  in  lieu  of  death  sentence  in
relation  to  the  1st  count.  He  has  also  been  sentenced  to  a  period  of  10  years
rigorous imprisonment on count 2. In addition, he has been ordered to pay a fine
of Rs. 20,000/- with a default sentence of 2 years simple imprisonment.
